term.title: collinear reaction

item.text: This is a reaction assumed to occur via an activated complex in which all of the atoms directly involved in the process lie along a straight line.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 149. 'A glossary of terms used in chemical kinetics, including reaction dynamics (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 158 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668010149)
